import React from 'react' import TopMenu from '../components/TopMenu' import { useRouteMatch, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Modal from '../components/Modal' import AddSynonym from '../components/AddSynonym' import { addSynonym, getAllEntity, addValue, removeSynonym } from '../actions' function AddEntitys(props) { const handelSumbit = (e, normlizedValue) => { e.preventDefault() let obj = { entity: { content: normlizedValue, synonyms: normlizedValue }, id: props.entity[0]._id } props.addVal(props.fb, obj) .then(() => props.getAllEntity(props.fb)) e.currentTarget.reset() } const handelSubmitSynonym = (e, data) => { e.preventDefault() props.addSyn(props.fb, data) .then(() => props.getAllEntity(props.fb)) console.log({ fb: props.fb, data }) } const removSynonym = (id, synonym, index) => { console.log(props.fb) props.removeSyn(props.fb, { synonym, id, index }) .then(() => props.getAllEntity(props.fb)) } return (

) } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { addSyn: (uid, data) => dispatch(addSynonym(uid, data)), getAllEntity: (id) => dispatch(getAllEntity(id)), addVal: (uid, data) => dispatch(addValue(uid, data)), removeSyn: (uid, data) => dispatch(removeSynonym(uid, data)), } } const mapStateToProps = (state, owenProps) => { const entity = state.entitys.filter(el => el.name === owenProps.match.params.id) return { entity, fb: state.fbdata.tokenDetail.userID, } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(AddEntitys))
